snippet.textDisplay:
I follow the lives of this channel regularly and although I largely understand (my language skills are sometimes approximate), I sometimes catch myself dreaming of one day seeing English subtitles appear...
Merci pour votre fantastique travail pédagogique. Salutations depuis la France !

snippet.textDisplay: @renan lucas sa Thanks but it will be fine. I feel like home on this channel 👍
